name: Car's Empire
description:
The Game

Car's Empire is a racing action game where you have to clear out a toy store to find your way through. Destroy more of the stores inventory than your opponent or just have fun causing chaos on your own.

Concerns?

Don't worry about ruining the Paint job of your car, it's not going to come off so crash into stuff as you please.

Playtest

We are still in development but would be very happy if you test our game. The game offers a local multiplayer, but if you don't have anyone to play with, you can also use the training mode or stream your game to a friend with "Parsec" and play together.
It would be great if you could fill out the online survey after playing and give us feedback.

There are still a few bugs we need to fix and currently only XBOX controllers work completely.

Team

Jan Magnusson - Production

Daniel Rieder - Programming

Sindy Krinke - Game Design

Hans-Joachim Wenzig - Level Design

Matthias Franz - Environment/Lighting

Tobias Wulff - Props/Characters

Bennet Bieck - Sound Design
